text: Well to be fair, 3rd Birthday isn't a BAD game, and it has some great music.  It's just not what we wanted from a third Parasite Eve game, pretty much.  It's one of those games where if it had just been released as it's own IP it would have been far better I feel.

author: RichterInfinite

text: I wish more games were like this one. Even on a Normal difficulty, you will find yourself retrying levels a lot on the account of dying. You have to strategize which enemies to take down first and which weapons you will use on each one. Knowing me, I probably won't do a second play through so soon after the first, but I bet I will return to it very soon.
author: FruggleFarkle123

text: A lot of people have been downing this game without even playing it because it's not like the other games.  You keep the system the same and prople gripe that you aren't being original; you change things up, and people gripe that the old system was better.  Just can't win these days.  Oh well, the music sounds fine to me, but I haven't played it yet, so I will wait til then to pass judgement.
